reviewText: For one who enjoyed " The Best of the Three Irish Tenors" on CD, to actually see them was greatly interesting. However the showmanship could br much better for an audience spoilt by Andre Rieu.
Great DVD; had the pleasure of seeing them in person in Clearwater, FL several weeks ago;  jwnderful show and well worth watching.
This was a gift for someone.
I always enjoy the Irish Tenors.  Always!
Any concert by these three is fabulous.
